(For any who didn't notice his e-mail, Icedemon says he is ill, and is too 
sick to participate for a while.  So...to not keep the characters busy with 
the fight stuck, maybe we should send Icedemon's characters to whence they 
came and have the Maximals go to the CR chambers...if they still work...or 
some other compromise)
